title.value: EurNet: Efficient Multi-Range Relational Modeling of Spatial Multi-Relational Data
title.justification: Extracted from the title of the paper.
title.quote: E UR N ET : E FFICIENT M ULTI -RANGE R ELATIONAL M ODELING OF S PATIAL M ULTI -R ELATIONAL DATA

extractions.description: This paper introduces EurNet, a model that addresses the challenge of modeling spatial relationships in data. EurNet constructs multi-relational graphs to capture short-, medium-, and long-range spatial interactions. The proposed model is validated in both image and protein structure modeling, showing gains over previous state-of-the-art models in multiple benchmarks.

type.justification: The paper includes extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection, ADE20K semantic segmentation, and protein function prediction benchmarks to validate EurNet's performance.
type.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet. On the EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks, EurNet consistently surpasses the previous SoTA GearNet.

name.justification: The paper's primary research field is focused on modeling spatial multi-relational data using multi-range relational graphs.
name.quote: To attain this goal, we propose the EurNet for Efficient multi-range relational modeling. In general, EurNets are a series of relational graph neural networks equipped with graph construction layers, where relational edges are constructed by the layers for capturing multi-range spatial interactions.

name.justification: The paper validates EurNet in the computer vision domain with tasks like ImageNet classification, COCO object detection, and ADE20K semantic segmentation.
name.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

name.justification: The paper also validates EurNet in the domain of protein structure modeling, focusing on tasks such as EC and GO protein function prediction.
name.quote: On the EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks, EurNet consistently surpasses the previous SoTA GearNet.

name.justification: The EurNet-T is a model derived for image classification and is mentioned as a variant of the proposed EurNet.
name.quote: we build EurNets with hierarchical graph construction layers and multiple modeling stages and derive a model series with increasing capacity, i.e., EurNet-T, EurNet-S and EurNet-B.

is_contributed.justification: The paper contributes the EurNet-T model as part of its proposed multi-range relational modeling solution.
is_contributed.quote: we build EurNets with hierarchical graph construction layers and multiple modeling stages and derive a model series with increasing capacity, i.e., EurNet-T, EurNet-S and EurNet-B.

is_executed.justification: The paper mentions that extensive experiments are performed using EurNet-T.
is_executed.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

is_compared.justification: EurNet-T is compared to various state-of-the-art models in the paper.
is_compared.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

referenced_paper_title.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

name.justification: GRMP, or Gated Relational Message Passing, is mentioned as a novel modeling layer employed by EurNet.
name.quote: EurNet adopts a novel modeling layer, called gated relational message passing (GRMP), to propagate multi-relational information across the data.

is_contributed.justification: The GRMP layer is introduced in this paper as a novel modeling component of EurNet.
is_contributed.quote: EurNet adopts a novel modeling layer, called gated relational message passing (GRMP), to propagate multi-relational information across the data.

is_executed.justification: The GRMP layer is used in the experiments conducted with EurNet.
is_executed.quote: EurNet adopts a novel modeling layer, called gated relational message passing (GRMP), to propagate multi-relational information across the data.

is_compared.justification: The effectiveness of the GRMP layer is compared with other models such as Relational Graph Convolution (RGConv).
is_compared.quote: Compared to the classical relational graph convolution (RGConv) (Schlichtkrull et al., 2018), GRMP enjoys lower computational cost when more relations are to be modeled, and thus can handle more types of spatial interactions given the same computational budget.

referenced_paper_title.value: Modeling Relational Data with Graph Convolutional Networks
referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper compares the GRMP layer with the existing RGConv model from a referenced paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Compared to the classical relational graph convolution (RGConv) (Schlichtkrull et al., 2018), GRMP enjoys lower computational cost when more relations are to be modeled, and thus can handle more types of spatial interactions given the same computational budget.

is_executed.justification: The paper does not execute FocalNet, but it uses the reported results for comparison.
is_executed.quote: where modern vision backbones like ConvNeXt (Liu et al., 2022) and FocalNet (Yang et al., 2022) can serve as the drop-in replacements.

referenced_paper_title.value: Protein Representation Learning by Geometric Structure Pretraining
referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference paper provides benchmarks against which EurNet's performance in protein structure modeling is compared.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Under this fix-architecture comparison, EurNet consistently outperforms the SoTA GearNet on standard protein function prediction benchmarks in terms of protein-centric maximum F-score (EC: 0.768 v.s. 0.730; GO-BP: 0.437 v.s. 0.356; GO-MF: 0.563 v.s. 0.503; GO-CC: 0.421 v.s. 0.414).

name.justification: ImageNet is used to validate the performance of EurNet in image classification.
name.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

referenced_paper_title.value: ImageNet: A Large-Scale Hierarchical Image Database
referenced_paper_title.justification: ImageNet is referenced for the dataset used in image classification tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: In this set of experiments, we benchmark the classification performance of different backbones on ImageNet-1K (Deng et al., 2009) (with 1.28M training and 50K validation images from 1,000 classes) in terms of top-1 accuracy.

name.justification: COCO is used to validate the performance of EurNet in object detection and instance segmentation.
name.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

referenced_paper_title.value: Microsoft COCO: Common Objects in Context
referenced_paper_title.justification: COCO is referenced for the dataset used in object detection and instance segmentation tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: This experiment benchmarks the object detection and instance segmentation performance on COCO 2017 (Lin et al., 2014).

name.justification: ADE20K is used to validate the performance of EurNet in semantic segmentation.
name.quote: Extensive experiments on ImageNet classification, COCO object detection and ADE20K semantic segmentation verify the gains of EurNet over the previous SoTA FocalNet.

referenced_paper_title.justification: ADE20K is referenced for the dataset used in semantic segmentation tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: This experiment benchmarks the semantic segmentation performance of different backbones on ADE20K (Zhou et al., 2017) which contains 20K training, 2K validation and 3K test images.

name.justification: The EC dataset is used to validate the performance of EurNet in protein function prediction.
name.quote: On the EC and GO protein function prediction benchmarks, EurNet consistently surpasses the previous SoTA GearNet.

referenced_paper_title.value: Structure-Based Protein Function Prediction Using Graph Convolutional Networks
referenced_paper_title.justification: EC is referenced for the dataset used in protein function prediction tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: This set of experiments compare different protein structure encoders on the EC (Gligorijević et al., 2021) and GO (Gligorijević et al., 2021) protein function prediction benchmarks.

name.justification: The GO dataset is used to validate the performance of EurNet in protein function prediction.

name.justification: The implementation of EurNet models is based on the PyTorch deep learning library.
name.quote: We implement the models based on the PyTorch (Paszke et al., 2017) deep learning library.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference paper documents the library used for implementing EurNet.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We implement the models based on the PyTorch (Paszke et al., 2017) deep learning library.
